sources.title: Party Girl
sources.description: Title: Party Girl Summary: Jay Rountree, son of a wealthy manufacturer and young, rising businessman, gets caught up in a web involving an escort service or 'party girls.' While eluding the wily Diana Holster, the ... Directed by: Victor Halperin Actors: Douglas Fairbanks Jr., Jeanette Loff, Judith Barrie Production Company: Victor Halperin Productions Release Date: 1 January 1930 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Jay Rountree, son of a wealthy manufacturer and young, rising businessman, gets caught up in a web involving an escort service or 'party girls.' While eluding the wily Diana Holster, the self-proclaimed Queen of the Party Girls, he manages to get trapped in a web spun by Leeda Cather and her supposed mother and, much to his consternation and to the surprise of his fiancée, Jay soon finds himself an unhappily married man. And, as events would show, Diana isn't all that happy, herself.

sources.title: Party Girl (1930) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Stars: Douglas Fairbanks Jr., Jeanette Loff, Judith Barrie 
Director: Victor Halperin (as Rex Hale)

A young, rising businessman and the son of a wealthy manufacturer falls prey to escort service "party girls," much to the dismay and surprise of his fiancée!

metadata.Plot: Jay Rountree, son of a wealthy manufacturer and young, rising businessman, gets caught up in a web involving an escort service or 'party girls.' While eluding the wily Diana Holster, the self-proclaimed Queen of the Party Girls, he manages to get trapped in a web spun by Leeda Cather and her supposed mother and, much to his consternation and to the surprise of his fiancée, Jay soon finds himself an unhappily married man. And, as events would show, Diana isn't all that happy, herself.
metadata.Writer: Edwin Balmer, George Draney, Victor Halperin
metadata.Actors: Douglas Fairbanks Jr., Jeanette Loff, Judith Barrie
